description.rawText: We are looking for a future Data Scientist that will be involved in the following activities,  for example:     Hadoop programming in Hive,  Spark,  Imapala,  MapReduce to process a massive real-time data stream (e. g. ,  Kinesis,  Kafka) inside a Big Data cluster (e. g. ,  Amazon EMR) and exports the aggregated data to an RDBMS database (e. g. ,  MySql)   Developing SQL scripts to query a MPP (Massively Parallel Processing) Big Data backend (e. g,  Postgres-XL,  Crate. io) and feed the results to a front-end web application for real-time slicing/dicing and interactive visualizing of the data   MapReduce large amounts of data (900M records) using Hive/Pig and create visualizations in Tableau by connecting to the Hive Server   Apply Machine Learning to sports.  E. g. ,  what is the impact of Injury on the performance of other players in the team in Americal football (NFL)   Twitter Analytics - develop a python script to collect the tweets,  process the tweets using a Spark application,  store the processed data on a Redshift database in AWS,  develop machine learning and NLP models on this data,  and visualize this on Tableau     The above examples are just a glimpse on the kind of projects at Winnow.    An ideal canditate would be a quick learner,  with decent IQ and a passion to become a data scientist.    If you were a Gamer and a Hacker-for-fun back in college,  then I think we'd like to hear from you.

companyDescription.rawText: Winnow is an outsourced analytics services partner based in Bangalore.  Founded in 2008,  Winnow has been serving a few Global 200 companies in the area of Data Sciences,  Business Intelligence,  Data Warehousing,  Big Data,  Web Analytics,  and Online Marketing Optimization.
